member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:DSC.EmailProtocol.My.Resources.Resources.Culture

member.summary: Saves the attachment to a file on disc
member.param: The path + name of the file to be saved

member.name: P:DSC.EmailProtocol.IEmailClient.host
member.summary: The host internet address.

member.name: P:DSC.EmailProtocol.IEmailClient.port
member.summary: The server port to connect to

member.name: P:DSC.EmailProtocol.IEmailClient.user
member.summary: The e-mail account user to log in

member.name: P:DSC.EmailProtocol.IEmailClient.pass
member.summary: The e-mail account password to log in

member.name: P:DSC.EmailProtocol.IEmailClient.SSL
member.summary: set if the server requires SSL security or not

member.name: P:DSC.EmailProtocol.IEmailClient.enableLog
member.summary: Enables or disables the LOG functionality
member.value: True enable the LOG False disable the LOG

member.name: M:DSC.EmailProtocol.IEmailClient.connectAndLogin
member.summary: Connects to the server an log in using HOST, PORT, USER, PASS and SSL specified

member.name: M:DSC.EmailProtocol.IEmailClient.createNewFolder(System.String)
member.summary: Create a new folder on the IMAP server.
member.param: CASE SENSITIVE The name of the folder to be created. This name must or not be absolute. Depending of the server. The folder's name separator is the '.' character. ex: INBOX.folderName

member.name: M:DSC.EmailProtocol.IEmailClient.isConnected
member.summary: Verify if this client is connected to the server.
member.returns: Returns TRUE if the user is connected to the server and FALSE if the user is NOT connected

member.name: M:DSC.EmailProtocol.IEmailClient.isLoggedIn
member.summary: Verify if the client is connected to the server and logged in
member.returns: Returns TRUE if the user is logged in and FALSE if the user is NOT logged in

member.name: M:DSC.EmailProtocol.IEmailClient.logout
member.summary: Log out from the server

member.name: M:DSC.EmailProtocol.IEmailClient.moveMessageToFolder(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Move messages between folders
member.param: Message UID (Unique ID assigned to the message) to be moved. CASE SENSITIVE
CASE SENSITIVE Folder name to move the message To

member.name: M:DSC.EmailProtocol.IEmailClient.deleteMessage(System.String)
member.summary: Delete a message from the server If you are using a POP client, you need to logout to the DELETE command take effect on next time ou login
member.param: UID (Unique ID assigned to the message) to be deleted

member.name: M:DSC.EmailProtocol.IEmailClient.getAllMessagesUID
member.summary: Returns an array of String containing all messages UID on the server
member.returns: A array of String containing the messages UID

member.name: M:DSC.EmailProtocol.IEmailClient.getMessage(System.String)
member.summary: Return a IMAP.email object containing informations about the message
member.param: The message UID(Unique ID assigned to the message) to get
member.returns: A IMAP.email object filled with message info.

member.name: M:DSC.EmailProtocol.OUTLOOKClient.downloadAttachments(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Conecta a uma pasta do outlook e baixa todos os e-mails e anexos contidos na pasta
member.param: A pasta do Outlook de onde serão extraídos os e-mails. Ex.: Conta abc@empresa.com.br, Pasta Inbox => '\\abc@empresa.com.br\inbox'

A pasta do Outlook para onde serão movidos os e-mails baixados. Ex.: Conta abc@empresa.com.br, Pasta Backup => '\\abc@empresa.com.br\backup' Caso este parâmetro não seja fornecido, o e-mail será apagado.
Pasta do computador ou da rede onde serão gravados os anexos baixados
Pasta do computador ou da rede onde serão gravados os arquivos de e-mail (EML) baixados OPCIONAL.
Prefixo a ser concatenado ao nome do anexo - OPCIONAL
Prefixo a ser concatenado ao nome do arquivo (EML) - OPCIONAL
Sufixo a ser concatenado ao nome do anexo - OPCIONAL
Sufixo a ser concatenado ao nome do anexo - OPCIONAL
